title: Saiyo Saiyo Song Lyrics Bagavathi
stanzas:
Saiyo Saiyo Song Lyrics Bagavathi
#Deva

Saiyo saiyo Saiyo
poo poothaal adi
un vaasam

haiyo haiyo haiyo
mazhai peithaal
adi un vaasam

kadal kaattril undhan
vaasam
uyir moochil undhan
vaasam

Saiyo saiyo Saiyo
poo poothaal adi
un vaasam

haiyo haiyo haiyo
mazhai peithaal
adi un vaasam

rendu spoon punnagai
rendu spoon vanmurai
kannodu kalandhadhu
yaeno ?

rendu spoon muthangal
rendu spoon vetkangal
kannathil koduthathu
yaeno ?

un srippu ellaam
anbae haikoo kavadhaiyadi
adhai padithu paarhtaen
ayyo puriyave illaiyadi

en vizhi vilakkai
nee urasiyadhum
kadhal bootham
ondru kudhikkum

oru karuppu vellai
pookkal undaa kaettaen
adhai undhan kannil
kandaen kandaen.

Saiyo saiyo Saiyo
poo poothaal ada
un vaasam

haiyo haiyo haiyo
mazhai peithaal
ada un vaasam

Azhagaanaa idhalaal
adikkadi adikkadi
ayyo enbadhai rasithaen.

chudithaaril theriyaamal
siru viral pattaaalum
anbae nee sorry enbaai
rasithaen

un niyabagathaal
varugira thummalai
rasithaen.

en peyarai solli
ne seyyum archanai
rasithaen.

rail nilayathile
ennai vali anuppi
jannal oram azhudhaai
rasithaene..

mazhai maadhathile
kudai maraithuvitu
endhan kudaikul vandhaai
rasithaen.

Saiyo saiyo Saiyo
poo poothaal adi
un vaasam

haiyo haiyo haiyo
mazhai peithaal
adi un vaasam

kadal kaattril undhan
vaasam
uyir moochil undhan
vaasam
